謀事.definition: to plan matters; to look for a job

謀事在人，成事在天.pinyin: móu shì zài rén ， chéng shì zài tiān
謀事在人，成事在天.definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.

謀利.definition: to make a profit; to gain; to get an advantage

謀反.definition: to plot a rebellion; to conspire against the state

謀取.definition: to seek; to strive for; to obtain; see also 牟取[mou2 qu3]

謀士.definition: skilled manipulator; tactician; strategist; advisor; counsellor

謀害.definition: to conspire to murder; to plot against sb's life

謀慮.definition: to plan and consider; to reflect on one's best strategy

謀殺.definition: to murder; to assassinate; intentional homicide

謀生.definition: to seek one's livelihood; to work to support oneself; to earn a living

謀職.definition: to look for a job; to seek employment

謀臣.definition: imperial strategic adviser; expert on strategy

謀臣如雨.definition: strategic experts as thick as rain (idiom); no shortage of advisers on strategy

謀財害命.definition: to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money

謀食.definition: to make a living; to strive to earn a living
